title: Satellite based Cryptographic Layer - Extra-terrestial Extension to Ethereum
description:
Using nano-satellites with edge compute units we will show how we intend to build an orbital compute layer with unique properties. We will propose a novel cryptographic applications layer built with vision to space explorations.

Typically public blockchains enable cryptographic primitives for the digital commons on earth, we will share novel implementation of cryptographic applications that will extend the digital commons into Low Earth Orbit (LEO) and import cryptographic resources from LEO.
